flowRoot.flowPara: The options button is only displayed if there is more than one input source.
IMEs are identified using the system-run-symbolic icon.
Login Options is what we currently know as system level settings. It is only displayed for administrators when there is more than one user account.

text.tspan: Login settings are used by all users when logging into the system.

flowRoot.flowPara: The language code isn't shown when there is only one language.

text.tspan: Add keyboard layouts or other input methods.

flowRoot.flowPara: Selecting an input method opens its settings window/keyboard layou window

text.tspan: Add keyboard layouts or other input methods.

flowRoot.flowPara: The short list contains languages relevant to the current display language and location, as well as any languages containing 3rd party input engines.
3rd party engines have a link to their page in the Software app
Selecting the ... shows the full list and a search box.

text.tspan: Search for languages or input sources
Use the same source for all windows
Allow different sources for each window
You can change these keyboard shortcuts in the keyboard settings
